riddle: I can travel the world without moving, and I’m often heard but never seen. What am I?
The more you take from me, the bigger I become. What am I?
I have keys but no locks, space but no room. What am I?
I speak every language but have no mouth. What am I?
I go up and down but never move. What am I?
I’m always running but never tired, and I have a mouth but no words. What am I?
I shave every day, yet my beard stays the same. Who am I?
I can fill a room but take up no space. What am I?
You can catch me, but you can’t throw me. What am I?
I’m tall when young and short when old. What am I?
